sentences.sContent: The passengers were enthralled by the scenery.
sentences.sCn: 乘客们被这景色迷住了。

synos.tran: 奴役；使…做奴隶；迷惑（等于enthrall）

remMethod.val: en(使) + thral(奴隶) → 使成为奴隶 → 迷惑

words.tran: 迷住；奴役；令人愉快（enthral的过去分词）

trans.tranOther: to make someone very interested and excited, so that they listen or watch something very carefully
